content: Highly recommend taking the day off after an overwhelming conference and having a little treat by the water ✨

photo.alt: An almost Instagram-ready photo of a beautiful gluten-free blueberry cheesecake. I say almost because the top of the tip was crushed in the bag walking over. In the background, you can see the Berliner Dom, the Spree, and other people sitting in the sun.
Same background but now a selfie. I’m taking the photo and holding the cake. Mirjam is in the back flashing a peace sign. You can see iced americanos sitting in front of us on the ground.
